## eachSeries() function

The same as [each()](./promizr.each.md)<!-- -->, only `iterator` is applied to each item in `array` in series. The next `iterator` is only called once the current one has completed. This means the `iterator` functions will complete in order.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function eachSeries<T>(array: T[], iterator: AsyncListIterator<T, unknown>): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | T\[\] | The array to iterate on |
|  iterator | [AsyncListIterator](./promizr.asynclistiterator.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, unknown&gt; | The iterator to apply on each item |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
